pr_title: settings: Automatically set 24-hour time
pr_body:
<!-- What's this PR for?  (Just a link to an issue is fine.) -->
settings: Automatically set a 24-hour time at creating an account.
    
fixes #12555 Automatically set a 24-hour time at account creation
    added a hidden field "time_format" in regsiter.html.
    added function Islocale12Hour which uses a module Intl.DateTimeFormat to
    detect if the user locale is using 12hour or 24hour time format in
    signup.js and passing the argument time_format into do_create_user and
    setting the user default 24hr time format in create_user.py.
    modified test to test this function in test_message.py.
    tested in firefox and chrome manually.

**Testing Plan:** <!-- How have you tested? -->
Tested in Firefox v74.0 and google chrome v80.0 in Linux ubuntu 19.04
added test case in 00-realm-creation.js, zerver/tests/test_messages.py  and zerver/views/development/registration.py
